title: Projects
text:
This page showcases selected academic, internship, and experiential projects that highlight my capabilities in management, logistics, communication, and problem-solving.



Role: Warehouse Manager Intern
Skills Used: Inventory management, quality assurance, operations planning

Implemented quality control checks for inbound and outbound products.

Enhanced process accuracy by reducing errors in inventory records.

Coordinated daily operational tasks and improved workflow efficiency.





Role: Public Relations Intern
Skills Used: Communication, content creation, brand alignment

Designed and executed a social media strategy resulting in a 60% rise in engagement.

Managed organizational communication and meeting coordination.

Created branded content aligned with audience behavior and organizational goals.







Explored market research techniques, consumer behavior, and brand positioning.



Applied Excel and analytical frameworks to solve operational challenges.



Studied leadership styles, ethical decision-making, and team collaboration.





Supported low-income families enrolling in:

Housing programs

Bill-payment and welfare assistance

Community engagement events

This reflects my commitment to social responsibility and public service.

title: Home
text:
My name is Haytam Khalfi, an MBA student at University Canada West with a strong academic background in Management, Supply Chain, and Logistics. I am passionate about business operations, problem-solving, and building the competencies needed to thrive in modern organizations.
Through this portfolio, I aim to demonstrate my academic growth, professional journey, and the projects that reflect my evolving skills.




Bachelor of Science in Management & Supply Chain / Logistics

Experience in warehouse operations, inventory control, public relations, and digital content strategy

Strong interest in business leadership, analytics, and process efficiency

Certified in Design Thinking for Innovation





I aspire to build a career in:

Supply Chain & Logistics Operations

Procurement & Inventory Management

Business Strategy

Operations Management

My MBA is strengthening my ability to analyze data, manage projects, communicate effectively, and contribute to organizational performance.

title: Resume
text:
You can download my full resume here:
Download PDF



Motivated MBA candidate with a strong academic foundation in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, and Business Operations. Demonstrates exceptional analytical skills, organizational discipline, and the ability to solve complex operational challenges. Experienced in warehouse operations, digital content creation, stakeholder communication, and community engagement. Passionate about applying business education and hands-on experience to contribute meaningfully to Canadian organizations.







Analytical Thinking & Problem Solving

Market Research & Financial Reporting

Business Ethics & Data Interpretation

Professional Communication

Project Management

Teamwork, Leadership & Adaptability





Supply Chain & Logistics Operations

Inventory & Warehouse Management

Quality Assurance

Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook

Data Analysis








Morocco USA Education (MUE) – Rabat, Morocco
June 2020

Developed and executed a digital communication strategy, increasing engagement by 60%.

Managed high-volume email correspondence with consistent accuracy.

Coordinated meetings and schedules to support team productivity.

Designed engaging digital content aligned with organizational goals.





Engie Maroc – Casablanca, Morocco
July 2022 – August 2022

Implemented quality control processes for shipments and warehouse operations.

Oversaw daily workflow to ensure operational efficiency.

Conducted inventory audits, reduced discrepancies, and maintained accurate reporting.









Supported community Kermesse events.

Helped low-income households access housing programs and welfare services.

Demonstrated a strong commitment to community improvement.








Training in empathy-driven creativity, ideation, prototyping, and practical problem-solving for complex challenges.







University Canada West – Vancouver, BC
Expected: December 2026



Al Akhawayn University – Ifrane, Morocco
July 2022






Arabic: Native

English: Fluent

French: Fluent
